opponent.label: Fate
opponent.artist: Buddytibo2, Zeuses Swan Song (Model), Nomelet (Model), NinjaMonkey4200 (Posing)
opponent.description: Twisted Fate is an infamous cardsharp and swindler who has gambled and charmed his way across much of the lands of Runeterra earning the enmity and admiration of the rich and foolish alike. He takes things seriously while keeping a laid back attitude. In every possible way, Twisted Fate always has an ace up his sleeve.
